name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Story Point Totals for JIRA Kanban Boards

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension totals story points in JIRA Kanban boards and puts them at the top of each column.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will count up story point values present in any cards contained in a JIRA Kanban (rapid board) and show the total points at the top of each column (replacing the displayed number of cards).
